episode: I lost a lot of money in the stock market these past week which makes me apprehensive to the rest of the year.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I lost a lot of money in the stock market these past week which makes me very apprehensive to the rest of the year.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm really sorry to hear that. It's understandable to feel uneasy. Have you thought about any steps to manage the situation?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I just need to grind out the rest of the year to try to make up what I lost

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Stay strong, keep pushing forward, and you'll find a way through this.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: thank you for the encouraging words. I really needed that.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You're welcome. You've got this!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I hope so. But I am still very wary of the stock market

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's wise to be cautious. Take care, and trust your instincts.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I know I have to be strong but it is so tiring when you have to make up what you have lost

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It’s tough, hang in there. You can do it.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I have I can do it

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Absolutely, you have the strength.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: The strength to get through it

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Indeed, you shall persevere.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I just need to calm down and grind

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Take it easy, you’ve got this!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thank you for all of you kind words

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You're welcome, stay strong!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I will

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Good luck!
